name: BreastCancer
title: Breast Cancer
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a breast cancer diagnosis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with breast cancer diagnoses.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts related to cancer in male breasts.)
